channel.title: Buttons
channel.description:
ok, I need to know how to make buttons. I want to make the dialogue ones, the ones where u can choose an option in the chatting box (the chatting box is the place where you can send messages and others can read it)
I also wanna know how u can make the buttons where u right a text and it shows up as a button, when you click something it does the action. dont just say clickingmost.java cuz i dont know how to make a case for it.
